q: What happens when I buy bots?
a: When you buy bots, your USDT gets locked into the COTP Safe Miner smart contract and rewards you with 3.3% daily return every day.

q: Can I take my initial USDT back?
a: Bots cannot be sold, but the profits that bots earn can be withdrawn daily!
There is a 1% dev fee in order to pay for marketing costs and to support the platform.

q: When is the best time to buy bots?
a: Always! No matter when you purchase, you will begin with a return rate of 3.3% daily.
There are many strategies used to profit, but it is recommended that you compound at least once per day.

q: How is COTP Safe Miner sustainable?
a: The platform is sustained by the bots trading in the smart contract. As long as bots are trading there will be rewards!

q: Is it better to Compound or Withdraw?
a: By design, compounding will be more profitable than Harvesting in the long-term.

Once your BSC wallet is connected, you will see your referral address appear at the bottom of the page. When a new user purchases bots after clicking your personal referral link, the contract will send a USDT value equal to 12% instantly to your profits.
The term trading is used to describe the earning of profits from subsequent interactions with the smart contract.
